sense.def:
To conserve a supply of something
pomeni previdno uporabljati količino nečesa, kar nam je na voljo, da bo dlje trajala.

seg.quote: They made themselves wait quietly, conserving their strength.

sense.def:
To conserve something
pomeni nekaj ohraniti v prvotni obliki in tisto zavarovati pred poškodbami, izgubo ali spremembo.

seg.quote: Such laws exist only to conserve the privilege of this selfish minority.
